biography: Jarkko, also known as "Bailando", is a highly accomplished golfer whose dedication to the game has earned him recognition within the competitive golfing community.

Hailing from Hirsala Golf, Jarkko has consistently demonstrated exceptional skill and composure on the course. His performances at the prestigious Hector Trophée speak volumes about his golfing prowess.  He has participated in the tournament four times, in 2022, 2023, 2024 and 2025.

Jarkko's career highlights include a remarkable victory at the 2023 Hector Trophée.  In that year he achieved the rare double of winning both the coveted Hector Trophée itself, and also the prestigious Victor trophy for the best individual player. This dual win solidified his reputation as a formidable competitor and a true force to be reckoned with.

As Jarkko continues to compete in the Hector Trophée and other tournaments, golf enthusiasts eagerly anticipate his future performances and the potential for further success. His exceptional talent and strategic approach to the game make him a player to watch for years to come.
